data.text: Disappointed that Sip & Save is ending.... Otherwise, I'd give 5 stars... Cos I really do love your coffee! Especially the ones from different countries that rotates every few months. I'm probably not alone in thinking that I'd pay a little more for the sip & save if that's what it would take to keep it alive, as I'm assuming it was ended due to it's inprofitibility. I enjoy the games to (hopefully)win instant prizes & CS is always on point in my store.

I don't know when it started happening but I cannot see my home store or the barcode with my ID number on it when I open the app. I have to uninstall and reinstall. And then it only works right after I go through the process and re-enter my phone number. Once I close the app and then try to go back in, the same thing happens. Please fix the bug that is causing this. Then I will change my rating.

I updated this app 12/21/23, right after I reveived a text about the sweepstakes. There is no way to enter in the app... the linked pictures don't work... what seems like there should be a text link does not work. Not the first time I have had trouble; in the past I have had trouble getting coupons... it shows local stores and goes to a map when you click on yours and you can go no further. Had to go to website to enter sweepstakes. Staff at my store could not make sense of, or help with, app.

Great in theory....except nothing EVER rings up with the discount or coupon by just entering your phone number or scanning the app. By the time I've convinced the cashier of the price its supposed to be by scrolling thru the app, they are good and irritated, along with everyone in line behind me. I am hopeful you will work out the Inner Kinks.

It's nice to win prizes, discounts on gas, treats, & beverages, won lots. As for the ticket entries nothing has ever come of those, @least for me & I've won many. 1st part of game is fun-you win prizes. 2nd is inaccurately scored so it's frustrating when you select appropriate items in a row & they aren't counted properly! It makes the game pointless & no longer a challenge if it's not going to be documented.Therefore, a waste of my time! Loved easy pay,but took calling multiple x to get set up!

I love Circle k, but I've tried multiple times to sign up for the easy pay card. Every time, there are issues. I've been in multiple missouri locations, and none of the employees can ever help me with signing up or the app. I can not see my account number or how many points I've racked up. The andriod app doesn't have the same options or set up on it like the iPhone does. The only thing the app is good for is playing the game. I also can not see how many sodas I've got before my free one. Etc.

I love this app! I just wish I could put it on my SD card instead of my internal space. As a Circle K employee, I use this app frequently, but will have to remove it soon if the storage option doesn't change. I'm completely out of internal space and have very few apps. I tend to keep apps that can be saved to my SD card and delete the others. Please change the storage settings options!

Seemed great at first but then I noticed it wasn't registering my drinks purchases or chips purchases to qualify for freebies. I could deal with that, but then it stopped registering pizza purchases, which is the big pain because I drop by on the regular for a quick, cheap lunch. Kind of just makes the app pointless and a waste of phone space for me if purchases aren't getting counted. Deleting and shopping elsewhere.

I was directed to download the app when I went to their online promo page win dot circlek dot com. Considering the games ran fine in a standard web browser, asking people to download an app for the same functionality is an automatic fail, IMO. As for payment options, I have no use for that and judging by other reviews, it's not working anyway. Again, forced use of an app for something that can be achieved in another fashion is üëé

Well this sucks, Install the app and it goes no where, does nothing? Whats's the point in your site if it does nothing? I used to enter for the Sip & Save no problem, but now, even if I uninstall and reinstall nothing. Tried it on my laptop and my cell and the same thing happened, nothing! Hope this helps someone not waste the same time I wasted going nowhere on the Circle K site. It's crazy a company this big can get so much wrong. Don't count on using this App until Circle K fixes the bugs!

range from the latest generation of consoles such as the PS5 PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X video games, Nvidia Geforce RTX 4080 computer graphics cards, Ninja air fryers, through to must have toys for the holidays! Just find the product you're interested in, then click the ALERT ME button and we'll instantly send you a notification when it's back in stock and available to buy. We track them so you don't have to. There's no need for you to keep checking when they're back in-stock, or stay

Well I had the app on another phone. Once I bought a newer phone have had trouble downloading the app and now losing all promotions due to expiration date for the items. Plus have had no luck redownloading this app to phone again. I hope to find the issue if it's on my end otherwise someone needs to work out some bugs on the dev's end.

I have been playing the Holiday instant win games for years; all the Holiday stores recently turned to Circle K. This Gasino game does not work on my Samsung S22 phone, already have the Circle K ap installed and a sign-in, and it no longer works on my computer. There is no way to get into it to play. It sucks.

It suggests "potential location mocking" means that i am running the app on a device that has potential to mock its address. I AM NOT MOCKING MY GPS LOCATION; I HAVE THAT FUNCTION DISALLOWED. I cannot log on or sign in or anything. No androids allowed. This update DOES NOT WORK AND PREVENTS ME USING MY ACCOUNT. I WANT THE OLD CIRCLE K BACK BEFORE THE UPDATE. THIS ONE IS BROKEN.

It's only worth it to get the first 5 fill up discount. It doesn't keep track of purchases correctly, and it's hit or miss if the deals at your local store work. Example would be Baja blast bogo and a get a 5oz bag of candy get one share size free. None of that worked. It's stressful. I frequently get a coffee and a slice or 2 of pizza in the morning but their clubs counting the amount until free ones doesn't do it half the time.

The employees are very friendly and curious to everyone that I see come into and check out. I have been going there for over 25 years. I've seen some people leave and the new ones come in. There's no problem with who is hired out here, if something was wrong it's handled immediately. The store is always clean. Thank you.

Broken app. Been using the app for weeks now without an issue. Went to open it today (2/28/24) and it says I cannot use the app because of location mocking. It's an older phone but was working just fine yesterday. Between the broken app and in store staff being discriminatory I'll never shop at circle K ever again.

All of a sudden, after months of using this, it's giving me a potential mocking and won't let me use the app. This is ridiculous. You tell us to download an app which means it is gonna have different locations cause if you're traveled. This is like wow, so now I can't use the app. This is a little bit ridiculous. Somebody needs to do something about it.

Can't open the app it says potential location mocking and that I can't use it and then it just closes. This just started, nothing has changed and developer options are turned off, on a Galaxy S24 Ultra.

Too bad the advertised game does not work. I am a member. Have the app. I complained to circle K and got NO RESPONSE. Hard to convince people to buy gas especially when the app that applies to gas doesn't work. Speedway app works AND they respond when there is an issue.

This app sucks now! For some strange reason it gives me a message saying that I can't use the app because my device has the ability to mock locations which is BS! I have always use the app on this very phone. Circle K you better fix this!!!!!

The app randomly started telling me I couldn't use it because I am using a device that can spoof its location. First of all, I'm not. It's the same old phone I have had for years. Second of all, what do you care? I had to reinstall to fix whatever the problem was.

No matter how many times I've tried to verify my age in the app it won't let me. I've tried emailing for help but am given the same answer "just keep trying" I'm 52 with a valid FL Driver's License and can't get deals on age verified items in your Inner Circle. I'm stuck on the outside looking in.

I love getting my gas at Circle k it gives you cents off. Fountain drinks are at a good price and so is the hot dogs and sandwiches. You can also play the NC lottery and scratch off tickets. Circle K also provides breakfast and lunch. I love playing the inner circle app. With the inner circle app you can win cents off your gas free food and drinks. The app gives you so many games to play. I would recommend that people try the inner circle app. Circle K has clean bathrooms and is always stocked.

Ever since yinz updated App , App won't open says something about unable to open because my phone supposedly can fake it's gps location?? I even tried turning off locations and still won't let me open

Downloaded this app on 2 different phones and the app will not work on either phone says I'm on a device that can fake its location this is supposed to be a phone app get it together yall are horrible I'm done with circle k
The graphics are awesome and the ease of use app encourages continuous customer participation. Thank you for your efforts.
I love this app as a consumer and an employee! So many valuable money saving offers. Check it out it's also 100% free and all it takes is an email and a phone number.

I've had this app since it launched a while ago and not one problem, until today. I have sip & save and the closet store to me screen's to input my number isn't working so I tried to use the app but when I opened it, it's giving a "you are using a device that can fake it's GPS, potential mocking location" waring and can't use the app. I'm on samsung A03. Giving 1 star until it's resolved.
I just opened the app and got a waning about my device making GPS locations. I had been using this app with no issues. And now I can't even use it...
The app now started telling me that I'm using a device that can fake its location and I cannot use it. All I'm using is my phone and it worked last week just fine

The amount of information you require for easy pay is ridiculous. My banking info, drivers license, soc sec, and then you want a utility bill and bank statement? That is insane. If I didn't know any better I'd think you were trying to steal my identity. How about just a credit card and be done with it. I was trying to get a promotion that offered me $0.65/ gallon off and gas and it totally wasn't worth all the hassle and I consider this invasion of privacy criminal.
It worked for a couple days now The app won't load anything or let me sign in so until the bugs get fixed I am Uninstalling it let me know when it's fixed
I've had the app on my phone for months and now says my phone is mock location capabilities and not allowed to use the app .. I literally used it 2 days ago now I can not use at all
Tried to sign up for quick pay,but your app says my Driver license was incorrect and it's not . Florida driver
Says my device is rooted or jailbroken and so I can't use the app anymore. My device is most definitely not rooted or jailbroken so this is garbage.

I love this app! Check out the deals and rewards before heading into circle k so that you can get the best deals and rewards! You can save on cigarettes and gasoline as well! You do not get points but if you become a circle k member you get every 6th fountain drink free and every hot coffee free so if you are a daily coffee or soda drinker this really pays off!
Trash.. Tells me I can not use app due to location issue. Closes down as soon as I press ok.
They ended the drink club. That was the only reason I switched to Circle K. Back to Parkers, they have better fuel rewards.
I drink too much coffee/capuchino, but it's very good and clean at the 2nd & Baldwin store. Employees are exceptional as well.

I am a Circle K fanatic. I love it. I will drive past competitors to find a Circle K. I hate the app and Inner Circle. I really want to like it, but it's really bad. Specifically, the Inner Circle club for drinks. I use it and it logs purchases. Then, for no reason, it resets. I've lost out on several rewards. If it's doing this on one club, it's probably doing it on others. I've tried checking out on self serve and with a cashier and it happens on both. What a joke.

The first 5 fillups were with a $0.25 per gallon discount. I usually get about $0.02 or $0.03 discount with every fillup after. I don't know how the free coffee works, but I haven't run out of free coffee yet since I enrolled, and I get free coffee sometimes twice a week. They just built a new Circle k 2 blocks from me. I love the self check-out service, just put the coffee on the scanner platform and check out is easy peasy. I love this app and the rewards that come with it!

App does not work. It tells me it cant find me when looking up closest store. My location is on, app has permission to use location. When using store locator it cant find any stores on the map. It will show me on the map, but says no stores found. Even if I zoom into an area where I know a store sits. Last anytime I try to update my info it reverts back to wanting me to set a store then tells me there are no stores in my area. Done waisting time with this app.

Some of your locations are excellent, yet others are horrible. Some clerks are not helpful nor friendly. The store closest to me is out of things frequently, even before the pandemic. Dec. 29, 2023 UPDATE My home store remains subpar. The employees are all great, but the lack of cleanliness, item availability, plus the fact that they are now closed overnight is reason enough for me to go to another convenient store. They added a stove but yet hot food is a rarity.
data.replyText: That doesn't sound right! Can you give us more information at +18552761947 so that we can investigate.

data.text: Amazing app. The Best one I have ever known. Circle K Inner Circle really takes care of their customers. The deals can't be beat.

Since the last app update the points are not being counted on in store purchases (counted on the app but not on the register), leaving me with 8 of 5 shown for the soda club. The asst. manager was able to override and give me a free drink I had earned after showing reciepts, but the app has not reset the purchase count. Once that is fixed I will give more stars. 12/3: App doesnt work at all.
It's been great to save ,and any time I see a save on gas I jumped on it with prices are going up and down it helps every little bit is two thumbs üëç.
I usually love the app and have no problems but right now I can't even create an account.There's something wrong with the app right now

Funny how this app crashes when they still owe me money off gas, my buy 5 soda's and get a free one hasn't worked for almost a month! After 7 extra bought sodas the app is still only showing I bought 2! Then they wanted to re- validate my age it refused to let me enter my own app that they have my phone number locked up with. My phone company said they are putting errors on anyone trying to open their app. Really Circle k? It was bad enough that your store whom are Shell or Chevron won't accept

What's going on Circle K??? We're missing the games you usually present us with monthly. The last time I played was 18th December 2023. I've played your games for several years and its been more than 2 months since the last. ‚òπ
Love Circle k, always have. The app is very easy to use and we love the giveaways. Love sip and save drink deal and have been doing that for years now. Our local Circle k staff is amazing.
I use this app all the time for getting discounts from gas to rollergrill items. It has been super helpful and one that has been moved to my home screen now for ease of use
I updated my app and now it says it can't run the app because my phone will fake it's GPS location! I need help with this Circle K reach out!
Won't let me verify my age and states that my zip code doesn't exist, which it does. I keep getting error and I haven't had any follow ups either!
BEST gas/grocery/food app out there!! Tons of deals, coupons, and rewards just for downloading the app!

I love the circle k app! The old one was working great my info including phone number is correct! Now the new one I sign in which is okay then sends passcode to phone never receive says invalid which I do not understand because in the old app all is correct in the new one invalid which is silly because I get text from circle k no problem! Maybe is the problem with the app itself! Until this is corrected nothing works like it should!

I'll admit, it's nice to save some at the pump with this app, but beware... Your phone number is sold to spam callers once you sign up. Since downloading, I'm averaging about a dozen spam calls a day. I've talked to a few others who recently got this app & they are experiencing the same thing. All, since signing up on this app. So, if you don't mind your phone ringing constantly with spoofed numbers, & want to save at the pump, feel free to sign up. Otherwise, save yourself the hassle.

This app is garbage. Set up the account, ordered am ez pay card to be mailed to me 4 weeks ago, never showed, meanwhile the short time frame where I'm able to get 30cents off each gallon is about to run out and 4 stores in a row have told me they don't have any cards in store. Set up new account to start the time over and now it won't let me set up the app because it's not finding any stores even though I'm sitting in the parking lot of 1 right now and my location is on! üóëüöÆ

I can't tell that the app is worth anything at all, except for finding locations. Doesn't have any discounts or rewards or anything of value. Just a store locator, and several tabs that just say "nothing to display".
Love the ez set up! Love the games! I really like that we can redeem more than 1 prize at a visit.

I love Circle K. I'm from New York, and they don't have any kind of filling stations like this in New York. I'm glad I moved here. The staff in the 10th Avenue store and any other store that I've visited in South Carolina. Or even on the way back to New York and back to South Carolina again.They're all very friendly people.

Please bring back Sip and Save. There is no reason or incentive to get gas at Circle K over cheaper stations near by or even within 5ish miles now. No "Sip and Save" = Cheaper Gas Stations winning out every single time.
REALLY disappointed that the new Gasino game NOT work. It keeps telling us to download the app and sending us back here.

I would give a 0... I do not .&&. I repeat would not even bother taking the time to set up anything with circle k... the app... your bank... Its a scam::. Same gas station filled my tank usually for $45 now it's $54 somehow... With the "25¬¢" discount::. Gas price did not go up... s0o something isn't adding up::. Go to King Soopers::. Highly recommend::. God Bless::. ‚ú®üí´üßøüßòüèΩ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èüßøüí´‚ú®
I have been using the app until recently when it says that my device is potential location mocking and shuts down. Nothing has changed on my phone can someone help?

The free item clubs are very hit-or-miss. Purchases only seem to count towards free items about 50% of the time. Buy two donuts, either zero or one will count towards the total most of the time. Chips never work at all. All the others are the same.
Easy to use. Can find local stores and current gasoline prices. Also can find what is on sale and if there are any contests going on.
I use it nearly every day. Runs smoothly. Useful to find bargains/deals, where Circle K are located, What the price of fuel and more.
The app is great. 4 stars because the contests and games don't work.

I've purchased dozens of drinks with the app or with my phone number and still somehow only have 4 drinks purchased for the beverage club. Doesn't work right and has owed me a free drink about 10 drinks ago.

Works well love the discounts and the internal app barcode always works at the register.i like the 30% drop in cost for my sodas. Between me and my 5 kids we get like 10 to 25 a week or so. Only thing I have issue with is it freezes when I try yo verify my age in the app don't know why.
I absolutely LOVE the sip and save program; it's what makes them stand out from the other gas stations

You guys tech team need to do something about the alcohol verification process. Keeps telling me age verification failed. I have my id for clarification but y'all don't offer that feature to verify. Uninstalling!

I can't use my app because the card I tried linking to the app wasn't active anymore due to fraudulent activity that same afternoon so my card doesn't work. Very disappointing because I can't try again with a new card now because it's linked with my email and phone number.
Keeps saying the camera is not allowed, but permissions show it is. Frustrating

It won't verify my age. I have done everything they have told me and still it won't verify. Customer service really sucks. If you can't get nobody to help with something simple, then what's the point of trying to use the app. I've lived without it before and certainly don't need it now.
Something is wrong with my app. All of a sudden it can't find stores or my location. All permissions are allowed. I'll change rating once this issue is addressed.

Such a hassle trying to do ANYTHING. This has got the be the WORST app I've ever came across... Constantly asking me for my DOB and SSN#, then it tells me I dont have an account set up, yet when I try to use my email to "set up" it says it's already being used... DO NOT GET EASY PAY OR THIS APP IT DOESN'T WORK THEN THEY REFUSE TO SEND ME A PHYSICAL CARD AND THEY SAID I CANT JUST PICK ONE UP...

fantastic app when it's working. occasional glitches. make sure your code is accepted before closing it because sometimes it says redeemed when it didn't take. don't be afraid to ask a cashier to help you. you WILL save money using it and the games are fun.

I have a prepaid gas card that advertised 25 cents off a gallon then 6 cents off after 100 gallons. They are only crediting me 3 cents a gallon now. Not the advertised 6 cents. Kinda mad about the false advertising. Not to mention when I try to sign up for the easy pay they require you to do it on a real computer. I don't own a computer so I can't link my account any other way, even when I try to call customer service they say they can't help me. What a load of hooey!
I cannot log in due to gps mocking when I have no VPN or mock location tech on my phone. Please fix this bug asap
don't know what happened but when I open the app , it's telling me that my device uses fake location mocking and I can't use the app
Love it easy to use great deals and discounts friendly staff clean store
Is a great app but just started telling me that I can not use the app because my location is duplicated
App is worthless. If I could rate negative stars, I would. Absolute garbage.
I just joined this site and have bought gas 3 times and I love the way I can fill my van up so easy.plus the 25 cents off is wonderful. As high as gas is going this is God sent. Thank you Circle K.
Sometimes it logs me out and acts like it can't locate my store.
This app is truly amazing and you really do save a lot of money and get not only free drinks but free chips and candy
Stop faking your location on monitoring apps. Hiding from your spouse or partner is the reason, lol. Honesty goes a long way lol.
poor connection and app does not have current promotions
The club never counts my drinks correctly and that's mostly why i have the app and the inner circle.
I'm starting to hate this app cause I can't find the circle k game on the app even though I'm a inner circle member
Love the savings on gas and other items and the free things are cool too. Who doesn't like free! Have my whole family on circle k app.

It is close and easy to get rewards for gas or things inside like free sodas. Coffee or snacks. I don't mind the self serve as it helps the long lines,( if you don't know you can pay by card or cash and you can get most everything there. I do wish they would bring back the fresh made subs that last gas had.

I only go to one circle k and I find the employees very helpful and friendly. I use the gas pumps poker machines pizza cookies and all sweet stuff. This is the only store I go to. Love it beside groceries
I keep opening iit but it does not show the casino game.
It won't open on phone. It says my phone has location mocking.
App is clumsy. It dose not update well Hard to find the little promo games
No showing stores even when location is on. Inner circle not working. You apparently didn't fix the issues. Keeps freezing and crashing as well. Do better Circle K

There is never any fast fresh and whatever food available and if it is there it's hard and old... There is never any slice pizza and ready and if it is ready it's either hard and old or just plain cheese and the remodel that they did in Pomona Park Florida is completely ridiculous
